meanings.definition: Edit (text) before it is finally prepared for publication.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys preediting her articles to ensure they are error-free.
meanings.sent2: The team will preedit the document before sending it to the publisher.
meanings.sent3: The writer accidentally preedited the wrong version of the document, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: Preediting is like polishing a gemstone before revealing its brilliance to the world.
meanings.sent5: Preediting is a crucial step in the writing process to refine and perfect the content.

meanings.definition: The process of editing text before it is finalized for publication.
meanings.sent1: Preediting requires attention to detail and a keen eye for errors.
meanings.sent2: The preediting stage is essential for ensuring the quality of the final publication.
meanings.sent3: During preediting, the team discovered a humorous typo that made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The preediting phase acts as a shield, protecting the publication from mistakes.
meanings.sent5: The importance of preediting cannot be overstated in the publishing industry.
